channel.description: Add a sign-in solution to an input constrained device (e.g. Apple TV) Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: - This guide contains reference endpoint information that needs to be stripped out of this guide and placed under the API reference if it doesnâ€™t exist. Understand which auth solution this is for: redirect, embedded, SDKS, API, or a combination of all three.
